Header.title: Project Management Services
Header.paragraph: We provide construction & project management for Federal Goverment and commercial clients globally

About.paragraph: Omni Networks is dedicated to serving the United States in fields such as construction, infrastructure, professional services and information technology solutions. Omni Networks was established as a Small Business, classified as such by the Small Business Administration - SBA. Today, Omni Networks is a leader in general defense contracting.

Services.name: FACILITIES MANAGEMENT
Services.text: We provide facility operations and base operations variety of professional services to federal government and commercial clients.

Services.name: LOGISTICS
Services.text: We offer complete logistics management as well as strategic logistical support to clients throughout the world.

Services.name: FUEL MANAGEMENT
Services.text: We provide complete procurement, logistics and advisory services for fuel depots in the United States and around the world.

Services.name: EFFICIENT
Services.text: We focuses client resources on providing operationally efficient services. Efficiency is doing only the right things.

Services.name: EFFECTIVE
Services.text: We have been the leader in doing things right through innovative business modeling, reporting and asset maximization.

Services.name: REMARKABLE
Services.text: We sends our operations managers to be trained in remarkable client service at AAA Five Star Resorts.

Features.title: Project Management
Features.text: We provide project management and program management services across federal government facilities.

Features.title: Facility Management
Features.text: Omni Networks facility maintenance and management solutions offers clients the opportunity to select one, several, or all of our maintenance service packages.

Features.title: Consulting
Features.text: We provide a variety of facility, real estate, energy, fuel, facility, security and logistical consulting solutions

Features.title: Cyber Security & Software Development
Features.text: We specialize in cutting-edge cyber and information technology solutions for federal agencies and commercial organizations.
